mapper.sql: SELECT t1.`BZ`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`FJ`, t1.`HYZK`, t1.`JHJSSJ`, t1.`JHJSSXW`, t1.`JHKSSJ`, t1.`JHKSSXW`, to_char(t1.jhjssj,'yyyy-mm-dd')||' '|| case when t1.jhjssxw ='20' then '下午' when t1.jhjssxw ='10' then '上午' else '' END AS `JHQJJS`, to_char(t1.jhkssj,'yyyy-mm-dd')||' '|| case when t1.jhkssxw ='20' then '下午' when t1.jhkssxw ='10' then '上午' else '' END AS `JHQJKS`, t1.`JHTS`, t1.`NJSY`, t21.`ORMORGID`, t21.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t1.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`QJZL`, t1.`SJJSSJ`, t1.`SJJSSXW`, t1.`SJKSSJ`, t1.`SJKSSXW`, to_char(t1.sjjssj,'yyyy-mm-dd')||' '|| case when t1.sjjssxw ='20' then '下午' when t1.sjjssxw ='10' then '上午' else '' END AS `SJQJJS`, to_char(t1.sjkssj,'yyyy-mm-dd')||' '|| case when t1.sjkssxw ='20' then '下午' when t1.sjkssxw ='10' then '上午' else '' END AS `SJQJKS`, t1.`SJTS`, t1.`TIPS`, t1.`TQLX`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`VACLEAVEDETAILID`, t1.`VACLEAVEDETAILNAME`, t1.`VACLEAVEMANAGEID`, t11.`VACLEAVEMANAGENAME` FROM `T_VACLEAVEDETAIL` t1 LEFT JOIN T_VACLEAVEMANAGE t11 ON t1.VACLEAVEMANAGEID = t11.VACLEAVEMANAGEID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t11.PIMPERSONID = t21.PIMPERSONID

SELECT t1.BZ, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.FJ, t1.HYZK, t1.JHJSSJ, t1.JHJSSXW, t1.JHKSSJ, t1.JHKSSXW, to_char(t1.jhjssj,'yyyy-mm-dd')||' '|| case when t1.jhjssxw ='20' then '下午' when t1.jhjssxw ='10' then '上午' else '' END AS JHQJJS, to_char(t1.jhkssj,'yyyy-mm-dd')||' '|| case when t1.jhkssxw ='20' then '下午' when t1.jhkssxw ='10' then '上午' else '' END AS JHQJKS, t1.JHTS, t1.NJSY, t21.ORMORGID, t21.ORMORGSECTORID, t1.PIMPERSONID, t1.PIMPERSONNAME, t1.QJZL, t1.SJJSSJ, t1.SJJSSXW, t1.SJKSSJ, t1.SJKSSXW, to_char(t1.sjjssj,'yyyy-mm-dd')||' '|| case when t1.sjjssxw ='20' then '下午' when t1.sjjssxw ='10' then '上午' else '' END AS SJQJJS, to_char(t1.sjkssj,'yyyy-mm-dd')||' '|| case when t1.sjkssxw ='20' then '下午' when t1.sjkssxw ='10' then '上午' else '' END AS SJQJKS, t1.SJTS, t1.TIPS, t1.TQLX, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.VACLEAVEDETAILID, t1.VACLEAVEDETAILNAME, t1.VACLEAVEMANAGEID, t11.VACLEAVEMANAGENAME FROM T_VACLEAVEDETAIL t1 LEFT JOIN T_VACLEAVEMANAGE t11 ON t1.VACLEAVEMANAGEID = t11.VACLEAVEMANAGEID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t11.PIMPERSONID = t21.PIMPERSONID
